attributes.action: Bring back BBC 3 on our televisions!!!
attributes.background: We need to bring back BBC 3 as it has been taken from our teles

rejection.details:
The decision to make BBC Three an online-only service is one taken by the BBC Trust, which is the BBC's governing body. It is independent of Government and Parliament.

The BBC Trust has set out the reasons for its decision here:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/blogs/bbctrust/entries/b428d959-e93c-48e0-8ba6-65335d773bf7
